entries.journal_entry_description: R2-D2 and C-3P0 want you to gather some helper droid interface units from the helper droid factory..
entries.task00_item_name: You find a helper droid interface unit
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: R2-D2 and C-3P0 have asked you to find some helper droid interface units for them to have analyzed.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to C-3P0 and R2-D2 with the helper droid interface units.
